articles.description: The owner of a 2021 Raptor posted on Instagram that he cracked his spine after a 50-foot jump
articles.content: Since the dawn of man, we have been trying to jump cars long distances. Its always been to varying degrees of success. On one hand, we have the Duke boys. On the other is that dude who launched and d… [+2421 chars]
